row.process:
:SET &fullcontrol# = "0" :SET &read# = "0" :SET &write# = "0" :SET &execute# = "0" :SET &length# = STR_LENGTH("&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#") :SET &length# = &length# + 2 :SET &UC4RB_USER_NAME# = SYS_ACT_USERID() :PRINT "USERNAME: &UC4RB_USER_NAME#"
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#*") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#, 1) : SET &line# = MID(&line#, &length#, 1)
: IF &line# = "r" : SET &read# = "1" : ENDIF
: IF &line# = "w" : SET &write# = "1" : ENDIF
: IF &line# = "x" : SET &execute# = "1" : ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &hnd#
:IF &read# <> "0" : IF &write# <> "0" : IF &execute# <> "0" : SET &fullcontrol# = "1" : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &read# <> "0" : SET &read# = "1" :ENDIF :IF &write# <> "0" : SET &write# = "1" :ENDIF :IF &execute# <> "0" : SET &execute# = "1" :ENDIF :IF &fullcontrol# <> "0" : SET &read# = "1" : SET &write# = "1" : SET &execute# = "1" :ENDIF
:PSET &UC4RB_OUT_READ# = &read# :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_WRITE# = &write# :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_EXECUTE# = &execute#
:SET &retcode# = 1 :IF &UC4RB_FILE_REQ_PERM# = "ALL" : IF &fullcontrol# = "1" : SET &retcode# = 0 : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_FILE_REQ_PERM# = "READ" : IF &read# = "1" : SET &retcode# = 0 : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_FILE_REQ_PERM# = "WRITE" : IF &write# = "1" : SET &retcode# = 0 : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_FILE_REQ_PERM# = "EXECUTE" : IF &execute# = "1" : SET &retcode# = 0 : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &retcode# <> 0 : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT = "Access denied" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = &retcode# :ENDIF
